      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      static Color fromARGB(int argb)
      Creates a color from a packed 32-bit integer in ARGB format.
      static Color fromRGB(double r, double g, double b)
      Creates a color from three separate R/G/B values in the range [0.0, 1.0].
      static Color fromRGB(int rgb)
      Creates a color from a packed 24-bit integer in RGB format with the alpha value set to fully opaque.
      static Color fromRGBA(double r, double g, double b, double a)
      Creates a color from four separate R/G/B/A values in the range [0.0, 1.0].
      double getAlpha()
      Returns the alpha component of the color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      int getARGB()
      Returns the color as a packed 32-bit integer in ARGB order.
      double getBlue()
      Returns the blue component of the color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      double getGreen()
      Returns the green component of the color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      double getRed()
      Returns the red component of the color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      int getRGB()
      Returns the color as a packed 24-bit integer in RGB order.
      int hashCode() 
      java.lang.String toString() 
      Color unPremultiplied()
      Returns a copy of the color, but converted from premultiplied alpha back to unassociated alpha.
